description: This file defines a CohereEmbedder class that integrates the Cohere API for generating text embeddings, including methods for obtaining embeddings and usage data, and managing the Cohere client connection.

classes.name: CohereEmbedder
classes.description: A class that wraps the Cohere API to provide embedding functionalities, including client management, response handling, and embedding extraction.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the Cohere client instance, reusing it if already created.

methods.name: response
methods.description: Generates an embedding response for the given text using the Cohere API, with configurable parameters.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Extracts and returns the embedding vector from the API response for the provided text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns the embedding vector along with usage information (billed units) if available.
